trans-unit.source: Your Claim request for %s, %s is currently pending.
trans-unit.target: Vaš zahtjev za preuzimanje %s, %s je u procesu obrade.

trans-unit.source: After its approval by getlokal, you will be able to upload photos, working hours, description of %s, as well as to respond to user reviews.
trans-unit.target: Nakon odobrenja od strane getlokal, bićete u mogućnosti da objavljujete fotografije, opis, radno vrijeme %s, kao i da reagujete na korisničke preporuke i komentare.

trans-unit.source: If you have any questions, feel free to %s.
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko imate dodatna pitanja slobodno nas %s.

trans-unit.source: Your Place Claim for %s, %s has already been rejected and you have been notified by email.
trans-unit.target: Vaš zahtjev za preuzimanje profila %s, %s je već odbijen o čemu ste obavešteni putem emaila.
